name: designer-excuses
title: Designer Excuses
description: Designer Excuses is a playful Raycast extension that generates lighthearted, witty excuses for designers
author: shreeram

commands.name: designer-excuses
commands.title: Paste Random Designer Excuse
commands.description: Designer Excuses is a playful Raycast extension that generates lighthearted, witty excuses for designers

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
